RACE.RACE_TEXT: COLONIAL DOWNS RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 72. Maiden Claiming Purse 25000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MALIBU RUMBLE was well placed early on the inside, made a three wide bid on the turn to take over, then drew off in the lane to prove much the best, ridden out. VALENTIN C chased the pace three to four wide on the turn and was up for the place award. PERFECT MOON stalked the pace three wide, made a two wide bid to gain a short lead on the turn, but then could not go with the winner and weakened, lost place award late and bested the rest. REAL MIKEY set the pace on the inside and was headed on the turn and weakened. PAY THE SQUID was reserved two wide, came four wide into the lane and had no response.

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu Rumble
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed inside, bid 3 wide turn, drew off stretch, ridden out

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Chad Frederick & Phoenix Farm and Racing

ENTRY.NAME: Real Mikey
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, headed turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Valentin C
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, 3-4 wide turn, up for place

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 2 wide, weakened, lost 2nd late

ENTRY.NAME: Pay the Squid
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved 2 wide, came 4 wide, failed to respond,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: COLONIAL DOWNS RACE 2 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 83. Claiming Purse 34500. INNER TURF FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since August 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less No t Considered In Allowances) (Condition Eligibility). (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GLOBAL SENSATION tracked the pace two wide, made a two wide bid in hand on the turn to take over nearing the quarter pole, then drew clear off the turn and remained clear to the wire under right handed crop. SUPER E was reserved early on the inside, eased out on the turn, came five wide into the lane and finished well to gain the place award. ESOR tracked the pace on the inside, then was boxed by the quarter pole, eased out and came three wide into the lane and finished willingly to the wire but lost the place award late. BOFFO KID was rated early and made a three wide move on the turn, came four wide into the lane but flattened out. GAMBLING TZAR was reserved on the inside, angled out in the lane and offered a belated rally. SPEAKERIT set the pace while clear on the inside and gave way in the drive. AKINGISALWAYSKING had a four wide pursuit on the backstretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Boffo Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 3 wide, bid 3 wide, came 4 wide, flattened out,

ENTRY.NAME: Esor
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, boxed 1/4, came 3 wide, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Super E
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, eased out turn, came 5 wide, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Global Sensation
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 2 wide, bid 2 wide in hand, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Speakerit
ENTRY.COMMENT: set unchallenged pace inside, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Akingisalwaysking
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide pursuit backstretch, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Gambling Tzar
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, angled out, belatedly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: COLONIAL DOWNS RACE 3 5 1/2F Outer turf CR: 71. Maiden Special Weight Purse 60000. OUTER TURF FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $25,000 In Last 5 Starts). (Rail at 82 feet). and One Half Furlongs).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROANAN GODDESS chased the front runner from the inside, tipped out three wide leaving the turn brushing with CORINTH by the three sixteenths, then made a bid and went on even terms for the lead by the furlong marker and took over leaving the sixteenth marker and then kept the closing GREAVETTE safe late to prove best, driving. GREAVETTE was settled and three wide on the turn, angled out to the outside in the lane and closed well late. ENDURING broke sharply to set a fast pace on the inside while clear, then was headed by the furlong marker dug in and gave way grudgingly while saving the show award. LANDOFHOPEANDREAMS was settled early and saved ground on the turn, came two wide into the lane and finished well towards the inside. ARIEL MOON chased the pace three wide on the turn, came four wide into the lane and had no late kick. CORINTH tracked the pace two wide, came three wide into the lane and was brushed by the three sixteenths by the winner and weakened. LATE NITE LIZZIE was reserved early, two to three wide on the turn and had no rally. TAKE YOUR POINT was settled back on the inside and had no rally. TAJOL GIRL was settled on the inside and dropped back. MOBINAH was settled back two wide and failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Late Nite Lizzie
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 3 wide turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Enduring
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set fast unchallenged pace rail,headed 1/8,held 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Tajol Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, dropped back,

ENTRY.NAME: Landofhopeandreams
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, saved ground turn, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Roanan Goddess
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace inside, tipped 3 wide, brushed foe, bid, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Corinth
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 2 wide, brushed 3/16, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Take Your Point
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, inside turn, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Ariel Moon
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 3 wide turn, came 4 wide, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Mobinah
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Greavette
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled 3 wide turn, came 4 wide, angled out, closed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: COLONIAL DOWNS RACE 4 1 1/8M Inner turf CR: 83. Claiming Purse 20000. INNER TURF FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MARCH 7. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000. (Rail at 12 feet). ile and One Eighth).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BARLEEWON was rated three wide, made a five wide bid off the turn, then drew clear leaving the furlong marker to prove best, driving. VOLTAMOUR set the pace on the inside and was well handled, then came out under left handed crop leaving the turn, then was straightened and kept on to be clearly second best. CELERITY stalked the pace three wide, then two wide on the turn and made a four wide bid off the turn, steadied by the three sixteenths and then kept on to hold the show award. PETIT FILS (FR) tracked the pace on the inside, tipped out three wide to make a bid but was shut off by the pace setter, checked and then kept on to just miss the show award. VINTNER was allowed to settle on the inside, angled out six wide leaving the turn and had no kick. NOBLE CONQUEST was settled early, four wide pursuit on the backstretch and had no gain. ATTENTIVE was reserved early, three wide on the turn and swung out six wide leaving the turn and lacked a rally. COLONIST was reserved three wide and was not a threat. POWER (BRZ) was reserved on the inside and failed to threaten. REYNA DE VERANO was settled back early, came wide into the lane and was not a factor. CLOSER LOOK was void of early speed, swung out seven wide leaving the turn and failed to menace. Both the number seven and the number eight claimed foul against VOLTAMOUR for interference in upper stretch, after the STEWARDS reviewed the replays they allowed both OBJECTIONS AND DISQUALIFIED VOLTAMOUR FROM SECOND PLACE AND PLACED HIM FOURTH.

ENTRY.NAME: Attentive
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 3 wide turn, swung 6 wide, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Reyna de Verano
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, came wide upper stretch, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Vintner
ENTRY.OWNER: Del Sol Farm LLC and Bredeson, Gordon W.
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle inside, angled out 6 wide, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Noble Conquest
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, 4 wide pursuit backstretch, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Closer Look
ENTRY.COMMENT: void early speed, swung 7 wide, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Power (BRZ)
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, saved ground turn, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Petit Fils (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, tipped 3 wide, shut off 3/16, missed 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Voltamour
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace inside, came out upper stretch, held 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Celerity
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 4 wide, steadied 3/16, held 3rd

ENTRY.NAME: Barleewon
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 3 wide, bid 5 wide 3/16, drew clear, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: McMahon of Saratoga Thoroughbreds, LLC& Spruce Lane Farm

ENTRY.NAME: Colonist
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved early, 3 wide trip, no threat,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: COLONIAL DOWNS RACE 5 5 1/2F Outer turf CR: 71. Maiden Special Weight Purse 60000. OUTER TURF FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $25,000 In Last 5 Starts). (Rail at 82 feet). and One Half Furlongs).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INDEPENDENCEAVENUE broke alertly, was taken in hand to settle just off the pacesetter, rallied in upper stretch to take command in mid-stretch, drew clear and was geared down as much best. THE MYTH reserved to race mid-pack while against the rail, rallied two wide in the turn, angled to four path down the lane and finished well to be second best. RAPID TULA set a pressured pace to the top of the lane responded when challenged in upper stretch but weakened late in the drive. STARCRY well placed along the rail saving ground in striking distance and failed to gain ground down the stretch. STEAM KNOT chased the pace from near the rear and made a mild late gain in the lane. WHITE HEAT stalked the pace from two wide to the head of the lane and finished evenly. SHE'S SPLENDID was never a threat. CLASSIC DIVA was not a factor. SMOKIN SISTER broke awkwardly to be at the rear of the field and was outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Starcry
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, saved ground, failed to gain

ENTRY.NAME: Rapid Tula
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace, kept on, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: The Myth
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, raly 2w, tipped out, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Smokin Sister
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward break, trailed, outrun

ENTRY.NAME: White Heat
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, leveled out

ENTRY.NAME: Independenceavenue
ENTRY.OWNER: West Point Thoroughbreds Delfiner Marvin and Scarlet Oak Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, pressed pace, took command, clear, gear down

ENTRY.NAME: Steam Knot
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, mild late gain wide

ENTRY.NAME: She's Splendid
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Diva
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: COLONIAL DOWNS RACE 6 1M Inner turf CR: 91. Claiming Purse 45000. INNER TURF FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000, if for $25,000, allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $20,000 Or Less Not C onsidered In Allowances). (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STREET COPPER was rated two wide early, between rivals on the backstretch, eased out on the turn and made a four wide bid off the turn, then was put to a long drive and slowly edged clear late to prove best, driving. CLINT MAROON (GB) chased the pace on the inside, made a three wide bid off the turn to take over, then dug in gamely in th furlong grounds but was out-kicked by the winner, second best. VALENTINE BUG broke in at the start, settled back early, advanced between rivals on the turn, came four wide into the lane and rallied, got show award. SEVEN CHANNELS was settled back early, advanced on the inside on the turn, swung out three wide leaving the turn and had a mild late rally to just miss the show award. BODECREAM was allowed to settle on the inside, saved ground on the turn and had no late kick. ROMP was reserved early, advanced four wide on the turn and lacked a rally. GIRL DAD was settled three wide and was in between rivals on the backstretch, shuffled back and had no rally. EPIC LUCK was four wide into the first turn, vied for the lead three wide, made a two wide bid on the turn to take over but weakened. KENNY HAD A NOTION vied for the lead on the inside and gave way. HASN'T HAD ENOUGH chased the pace three wide and tired. SUPER JOHN five wide into the first turn, chased the pace on the outside and stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Kenny Had a Notion
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Clint Maroon (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace inside, eased out, bid 3 wide, dug in, out-kicked

ENTRY.NAME: Bodecream
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, inside turn, no late kick

ENTRY.NAME: Seven Channels
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, saved ground turn, swung 3 wide, missed show

ENTRY.NAME: Hasn't Had Enough
ENTRY.OWNER: Del Sol Farm LLC and Clarizio III Louis
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Valentine Bug
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in start, settled back, advanced between turn, rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Street Copper
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated 2 wide, between horses, bid 4 wide, long drive, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Girl Dad
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 3 wide between horses, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Romp
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, 4 wide turn, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Epic Luck
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, vied 3 wide, bid 2 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Super John
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide first turn, chased outside, stopped

RACE.RACE_TEXT: COLONIAL DOWNS RACE 7 5 1/2F Outer turf CR: 77. Claiming Purse 40000. OUTER TURF FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since August 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000, if for $25,000, allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (Condition Eligibility). (Rail at 82 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: YOU'RE AVOIDING ME was settled back on the inside, eased out nearing the quarter pole, swung out seven wide leaving the turn and closed full of run to get up in time under a drive. MOMENTOUS MISS was settled early and was four wide by the quarter pole, swung out six wide leaving the turn and closed well to gain a short lead near the wire but was denied on the wire. LADY ENSIGN chased the early pace three wide, then dropped to the inside leaving the five sixteenths, swung out three wide leaving the turn and finished well but was outfinished. MOONSHINING was rated on the inside, advanced on the turn and tipped out four wide for aim, made a bid and gained a short lead leaving the furlong marker but was out-kicked late. BABY LUCK was off slowly, outrun early, swung wide leaving the turn and had a late rally. LEVISA was reserved early, three wide on the turn and had a belated rally. BLUESKYSLOOKINATME tracked the pace two wide, swung out five wide leaving the turn but came up empty. TATOR MADE dueled for the lead on the inside and weakened the final furlong. LUNA WEST dueled for the lead two wide and weakened the final furlong. MURPH failed to menace. SEEKINGBYTHESTORM chased teh pace three wide and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Baby Luck
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, swung wide upper stretch, late rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Tator Made
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, weakened 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Blueskyslookinatme
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 2 wide, swung 5 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Luna West
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, weakened 1/8

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Ensign
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3 wide, inside 5/16, came 3 wide, closed, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Moonshining
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, tipped 4 wide, bid, led, out-kicked

ENTRY.NAME: Murph
ENTRY.OWNER: Pepe Stable and J L M Jacona Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: You're Avoiding Me
ENTRY.OWNER: Woolsey, E. Ervine and Kinder, Ralph
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back inside, eased out 1/4, swung 7 wide, closed, up late

ENTRY.NAME: Seekingbythestorm
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Momentous Miss
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4 wide 1/4, swung 6 wide, closed, led,denied

ENTRY.NAME: Levisa
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved, 3 wide turn, belatedly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: COLONIAL DOWNS RACE 8 1M Inner turf CR: 77. Claiming Purse 34500. INNER TURF FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since June 7 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500. (Rail at 12 feet). r the Turf course, it will be run on the main track at One Mile).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAEL was three wide into the first turn, reserved two wide, advanced on the turn and split rivals nearing the quarter pole, then came four wide into the lane and drew clear to prove best under right handed crop urging. FLEETS BAY vied for the early lead two wide, then rated back and was between rivals, swung oyut four wide leaving the turn and finished willingly to be clearly second best. BAIL OUT was reserved early on the inside, then was blocked and checked by the three eighths marker, swung wide leaving the turn for racing room and had a late rally. FIGHTNOMOREFOREVER was taken back early, advanced five wide on the turn and lacked the needed winning stretch bid. ZALFIERRO was four wide into the first turn, made a three wide middle move to take over and move to the inside, then weakened in the drive. GRANDPA'S KID was taken back on the inside and had no rally. VILLAGE PREACHER was five wide into the first turn, chased the pace four to three wide and weakened. IT'S ME AGAIN vied for the lead on the inside and gave way. WILD IRISHMAN was rated on the inside early, made a four wide bid on the turn and tired. MOON SIGN was three wide into the first turn and tracked the pace three wide and tied. THE THINKER was outrun early and pulled up on the backstretch and vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: It's Me Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Wild Irishman
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, bid 4 wide turn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Grandpa's Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: taken back inside, saved ground, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Fleets Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied 2 wide, rated between, swung 4 wide, finished willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Fightnomoreforever
ENTRY.COMMENT: taken back early, 5 wide move turn, needed stretch bid

ENTRY.NAME: Bail Out
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved inside, blocked, checked 3/8, swung wide, late rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Zalfierro
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4 wide first turn, middle move first turn, pace inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Grael
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3 wide first turn, reserved, split 1/4, bid 4 wide, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: The Thinker
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun, pulled up backstretch, vanned off

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Sign
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3 wide first turn, tracked pace 3 wide, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Village Preacher
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5 wide first turn, chased pace 4-3 wide, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: COLONIAL DOWNS RACE 9 5 1/2F Outer turf CR: 74. Maiden Special Weight Purse 60000. OUTER TURF FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less Than $25,000 In Last 5 Starts). (Rail at 82 feet). Half Furlongs).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHARDS was rated on the inside, swung out five wide leaving the turn, then made a bid and lugged in by the furlong marker, then drew off under strong left handed crop urging. FINANCIAL DISTRICT was off a step slow, reserved early, advanced on the turn and swung out three wide, then shifted back in the finished well for the place award while no match for the winner. LEGENDARY PHANTOM chased the pace two wide, then advanced between rivals by the quarter pole, made a three to four wide bid off the turn but flattened out, bested rest. SIR MASON vied for the lead in between rivals, made a two wide bid to shake clear on the turn but weakened the final furlong. PAEZ vied for the lead three wide and weakened. MAINTAIN vied for the lead on the inside and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Financial District
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, reserved inside, rallied for place

ENTRY.NAME: Shards
ENTRY.OWNER: Crown's Way Racing LLC NBS Stable and Marko Kevin
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, swung 5 wide, lugged in 1/8, drew off, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Maintain
ENTRY.OWNER: PTK LLC and McCutchen Robert B
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Sir Mason
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead between horses, bid 2 wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Paez
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead 3 wide, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Legendary Phantom
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 2 wide, between horses 1/4, bid 3 wide, flattened out
